p: Mentha spp. EOs are widely used for clinical purposes, mostly as an ingredient in creams for the treatment of musculoskeletal pains and as an analgesic for arthritis due to its property of reducing painful muscle spasms. Moreover, peppermint oil ( Mentha piperita L.) is used for soothing headaches, reducing spasms of the intestinal tract, and for symptoms of indigestion. It has a good antispasmodic action that relaxes the gastrointestinal tract [ 12, 103, 104], and is also good for neuralgia.
